Key Match Events: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 21 points, 12 rebounds, and 13 assists
Anthony Davis contributed 31 points and nine rebounds
Post-Match Reflections: Skip Bayless praised LeBron James as the most durable superstar ever, crediting his longevity despite an injury scare
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James banged knees with Rui Hachimura and shook it off
James returned after a timeout and scored two key buckets for LA
